data.name: Knottr
data.description:
Welcome to Knottrǃ A private‚ exclusive gay cis-mens VRChat community for gay furs who know what they want․ This is a space focused on after-dark socials‚ where you can embrace your primal side and explore your instincts with like-minded guys․ Whether you're seeking a deeper connection or just looking to get tangled up with the pack‚ you've found the right den․ Come get tied in․

Feel free to host your own Knottr instancesǃ Non age-verified instances will be auto closed by our bot․

This group is for the adult Puppies Of VRC․

Please refer to the Discord server to submit a moderation reportǃ

Our goal is to provide a safe space for adult furs to act like adults without having to worry about trolls‚ crashers‚ minors‚ or toxicity․ 

Anyone 18＋ is welcome as long as rules are followedǃ

data.name: The VRCreed
data.description:
Welcome to the Sacred Covenant of The VRCreed․ We are devoted to the pursuit of uncharted VR realms and the establishment of a haven where kindred spirits can converge‚ reveling in shared principles and visions․

Our enclave embraces all‚ extending a warm embrace to the diverse tapestry of the LGBT community․ 

Membership consideration is open to those vouched for by an esteemed member of our sacred orderǃ

Within the sanctum of membership lies entry to the Discord servera bastion where we routinely congregate in the ethereal realms of voice and text communication․ Here‚ myriad pursuits unfold‚ from the crafting of avatars to immersive gaming‚ leisurely repose‚ diligent toil‚ and beyond․

Bound by a virtual‚ we declare with one voice˸ We are The VRCreedthe chosen‚ united in the pursuit of virtual transcendence․
